channel.description: Recent content in luck on mental excess.

item.title: What If It Went Right.
item.description: About two weeks ago, I drove from here to EDC alone. Although I usually go to festivals with friends, I had committed to the 3-day endeavor because I was so gobsmacked the first time I went. The first view I had of the festival was truly incredible because of its scale, with tens of thousands of people, more than a dozen stages, and intricate design across the entire speedway. I wanted to arrive early, making the most of what I had committed a chunk of money to, and of course, for front-row parking.
